features.name: Order Management API
features.description: Create, retrieve, and manage orders with payment processing simulation

features.name: User Authentication API
features.description: User registration, login, and JWT-based authentication

features.name: Admin Management API
features.description: Admin-only endpoints for user management, analytics, and system administration

features.name: Analytics API
features.description: Real-time statistics, conversion funnel analysis, and custom event tracking

features.name: Job Titles API
features.description: Manage job titles and descriptions for resume building

features.name: Skills API
features.description: Manage skills and skill categories for different job titles

features.name: Professional Summaries API
features.description: Manage professional summaries for different job titles

features.name: Import History API
features.description: Manage CSV data imports for job titles, skills, and professional summaries

features.name: Template Management API
features.description: Manage resume templates with CRUD operations and usage tracking

features.name: Visitor Tracking API
features.description: Track visitor sessions and analytics for non-authenticated users
